line_1: "She's sober and ident, has sense in her noddle;
line_2: She's douce and respeckit" — "I care na' a bodle,

line_1: Or the rare Images that swell his Noddle,
line_2: But sitting up and Joking o'er a Bottle.

line_1: Have I not hid my Patient Noddle,
line_2: When Bully Rock has call'd for Bottle,
